body:
---PRD rezervasyon_Baslatma
Declare @IsRezervasyonYapilir int,@RezervTipID int,@StokTipID int,@StokRezervID int,@Mt TinyInt,@Kg TinyInt, @Ad TinyInt,
/*Cursor Varibales*/ @cPlanID int, @cPlanMiktar Decimal(28,6), @cIsEmriNo int,
/*Sub Cursor Variables*/ @SubcRezervasyonMiktar_Kg Decimal(28,6),@SubcRezervasyonMiktar_Mt decimal(28,6)  , @SubcRezervasyonMiktar_Ad int  ,@TuketimMiktar_Mt Decimal(28,6) ,@TuketimMiktar_Kg Decimal(28,6),  @TuketimMiktar_Ad int, @SubCAmbarID int,@SubCUrunTID int,@SubCUrunID int,@SubCPlanGirenID int


	Declare c Cursor Local For

	SELECT PRD.PlanID, (PRD.PlanKg-PRD.UrtKg) PlanMiktar, PRD.IsEmriNo FROM  IT05_PartiRotaD PRD
	INNER JOIN  IT05_PartiRotaM PRM On PRM.IsEmriNo = PRD.IsEmriNo
	Where  PRD.ProsesID = 20 And PRD.Durumu in (0,1) And PRM.Durumu In (0,1)

		 	  
--	 	Select	 
--		 CASE ISNULL(SD.AnaOlcuBirimID, S.AnaOlcuBirimID) 
--	 							WHEN 1 THEN ISNULL(PRD.PlanMt,0)-ISNULL(PRD.UrtMt,0) 
--	 							WHEN 2 THEN ISNULL(PRD.PlanKg,0)-ISNULL(PRD.UrtKg,0) 
--	 							WHEN 3 THEN ISNULL(PRD.PlanAd,0)-ISNULL(PRD.UrtAd,0) 
--	 							ELSE 0 End PlanMiktar,

--							    PRM.IsEmriNo,
								
--								PRD.ProsesID,S.AnaOlcuBirimID
--	 	From	IT05_PartiRotaD PRD 
--	 			INNER JOIN IT05_PartiRotaM PRM ON PRD.IsEmriNo = PRM.IsEmriNo 
--	 			INNER JOIN IT04_SiparisD SD  ON PRM.SiparisDetayID = SD.SiparisDetayID 
--	 			INNER JOIN IT06_Stoklar S ON SD.UrunTID = S.UrunTID
--				Where PRD.UrunDonusumu =1 

--ProsesID	AnaOlcuBirimID
--4					2
--3					2
--1					2
--30				1
--55				2
--5					2
--9					2
--25				1
--21				2
--2					2

		

	Open c
	Fetch Next From c
	Into @cPlanID, @cPlanMiktar,@cIsEmriNo
	While @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 Begin
	
		Select	 @IsRezervasyonYapilir = ISNULL(IET.IsRezervasyonYapilir,0)
					From	IT05_PartiRotaM PRM
							Inner Join IT01_IsEmriTipleri IET On PRM.IsEmriTipID = IET.IsEmriTipID 
					Where	PRM.IsEmriNo = @cIsEmriNo 
	
		If @IsRezervasyonYapilir  = 1  Begin 
	
	
			Declare SubC Cursor Local For
		

			Select  ISNULL(@cPlanMiktar*TuketimBirim_Kg,0) As RezervasyonMiktar_Kg, ISNULL(@cPlanMiktar*TuketimBirim_Mt,0) As RezervasyonMiktar_Mt, ISNULL(@cPlanMiktar*TuketimBirim_Ad,0) As RezervasyonMiktar_Ad, AmbarID, UrunTID,UrunID,PRDG.PlanGirenID
			From   IT05_PartiRotaD_Giren PRDG 
			Where  PRDG.PlanID = @cPlanID
		
			Open SubC
			Fetch Next From SubC Into @SubcRezervasyonMiktar_Kg,@SubcRezervasyonMiktar_Mt, @SubcRezervasyonMiktar_Ad, @SubCAmbarID,@SubCUrunTID,@SubCUrunID,@SubCPlanGirenID 
			While @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 Begin
	
							Select	@StokTipID = S.StokTipID, @Mt = ISNULL(ST.Mt,0), @Kg = ISNULL(ST.Kg,0), @Ad = ISNULL(ST.Ad,0)
	 						From	IT06_Stoklar S 
	 								INNER JOIN IT01_StokTipleri ST ON S.StokTipID = ST.StokTipID
	 						Where	S.UrunTID = @SubCUrunTID 

							Set @RezervTipID = (Select RezervTipID From IT15_RezervTipleri Where StokTipID = @StokTipID And AmbarID = @SubCAmbarID)
							
							If @RezervTipID Is Not Null Begin 

								Set @TuketimMiktar_Mt = ISNULL(@SubcRezervasyonMiktar_Mt,0)*@Mt
	 							Set @TuketimMiktar_Kg = ISNULL(@SubcRezervasyonMiktar_Kg,0)*@Kg
	 							Set @TuketimMiktar_Ad = ISNULL(@SubcRezervasyonMiktar_Ad,0)*@Ad

						
								Exec SP06_StokRezervasyon_Ham @RezervTipID = @RezervTipID, @AmbarID = @SubCAmbarID, @UrunTID = @SubCUrunTID, @UrunID = @SubCUrunID, @IsEmriNo = @cIsEmriNo, 
																		 @Miktar_Mt = @TuketimMiktar_Mt,  @Miktar_Kg = @TuketimMiktar_Kg, @Miktar_Ad = @TuketimMiktar_Ad, 
																		 @StokRezervID = @StokRezervID Output
		
		
								 Update IT05_PartiRotaD_Giren Set TuketimMiktar_Kg = @TuketimMiktar_Kg, TuketimMiktar_Mt  =@TuketimMiktar_Mt, TuketimMiktar_Ad = @TuketimMiktar_Ad, StokRezervID  = @StokRezervID, IsITUpdate = IsITUpdate
								 Where  PlanGirenID = @SubCPlanGirenID

							 END
		
			Fetch Next From SubC Into @SubcRezervasyonMiktar_Kg,@SubcRezervasyonMiktar_Mt, @SubcRezervasyonMiktar_Ad,@SubCAmbarID,@SubCUrunTID,@SubCUrunID,@SubCPlanGirenID
			End
			Close SubC
			Deallocate SubC
		
		End
		
	Fetch Next From c Into @cPlanID, @cPlanMiktar,@cIsEmriNo
	End
	Close c
	Deallocate c
